contentrichtext.text: [[Image:berney.jpg|thumb|right|Berney Arms Mill]] The '''Norfolk Windmills Trust''' is a [[charitable organization|charity]] based in [[Norfolk, England|Norfolk]], England, which restores and cares for [[windmill]]s in that county. Mills in its care (but not necessarily owned) include those at: *[[Ashtree Farm Mill]] *[[Berney Arms Windmill|Berney Arms]] ([[English Heritage]] - pictured) *[[Billingford Windmill|Billingford]] *[[Clayrack Drainage Mill|Clayrack]] *[[Cley Windmill|Cley next the Sea]] *[[Denver Windmill]] *[[Dereham]] *[[Garboldisham]] *[[Great Bircham Windmill|Great Bircham]] *[[Gunton, Norfolk|Gunton]] Park *[[Horsey Windpump|Horsey]] (NT) *[[Letheringsett]] Watermill *[[Little Cressingham]] *[[Old Buckenham]] *[[Paston, Norfolk|Paston]] (privately owned) *[[Starston Windpump|Starston]] *[[Stracey Arms]] *[[Sutton, Norfolk|Sutton]] *[[Wicklewood]] == See also == *[[List of windmills]] *[[Windmills in the United Kingdom]] ==External links== *[http://www.norfolkwindmills.co.uk/ Norfolk Windmills Trust website] [[Category:Windmills in Norfolk| ]] [[Category:Charities based in Norfolk]]
